attributes.action: Removal of non E.U & E.U law breakers first time
attributes.additional_details: The country we once loved is being abused by visiting criminals & those living here & claiming benefits.We are being used by our lack of responsibility & it worsens everyday.We need to freeze our borders & remove those who have been here for quite some time,maybe ten years.Our small country is overcrowded & yet our ports are still abused.We need to crack down as we are being laughed at,it is felt our borders are not the first agenda of those in control.
